LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_1stMutationChance: Configure the first group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_2ndMutationChance: Configure the second group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_3rdMutationChance: Configure the third group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceToHaveAMutatedGene: 1st group's chance to have a mutated gene
2nd group's chance to have a mutated gene
3rd group's chance to have a mutated gene
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_AllowedMutatedXenoGene_T: Default: Mutated genes can only be endogenes.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_AllowedMutatedArchiteGen: Mutated genes can be archite genes
Defaul: Mutated genes can not be archite genes.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_MinimumMetabolicEffForMu: Minimum metabolic efficiency allowed when generating mutation
The minimum metabolic efficiency allowed, used by ONLY this mod. Default -5.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceWithGrowingCarcino: The chance to develop random mutation with a growing carcinoma every X ticks
These muations do NOT obey minimum metabolic efficiency and are always xenogene.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_TickPerGrowingCarcinomaC: Default is 5k. There are 60k ticks a day.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceWithModerateToxicB: The chance to develop random mutation with a moderate (or worse) toxic buildup every Y ticks.
These muations do NOT obey minimum metabolic efficiency and are always xenogene.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_TickPerToxicBuildupCheck: Default is 5k. There are 60k ticks a day.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_LetterText: {0}'s genes have mutated due to {1}. {2} is now in his/her xenogenes.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_LetterText_Source_ToxicB: a harmful amount of toxic buildup
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_WhiteList: White list genes (use defName or LabelShortAdj)
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_WhiteList_Tooltip: Genes with these names can be chosen for random mutations. Separated by comma. Override black list.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_BlackList: Black list genes (use defName or LabelShortAdj)
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_BlackList_Tooltip: Genes with these names cannot be chosen for random mutations. Separated by comma.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ShowAllGeneDefName: Show all found gene's defName on debug console. The format is "defName - LabelShortAdj"
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ShowAllGeneDefName_Toolt: Good for finding out a gene defName for black list or white list. Enable dev mode to see the debug console.
